mapper.select: SELECT board_no as boardNo, board_pw as boardPw, board_title as boardTitle, board_content as boardContent, board_user as boardUser, board_date as boardDate FROM board WHERE board_no=#{boardNo}
SELECT board_no as boardNo, board_pw as boardPw, board_title as boardTitle, board_user as boardUser, board_date as boardDate FROM board ORDER BY board_no LIMIT #{startPage}, #{rowPerPage}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(board_pw, board_title, board_content, board_user, board_date) values(#{boardPw},#{boardTitle},#{boardContent},#{boardUser},now())
